item.description: On Tuesday, May 29, at 7:15p, The Disproof Atheism Society will present “Propositional Disproofs of an Omniscient God,” an open discussion, based on Patrick Grim, “The Being That Knew Too Much,” in M. Martin & R. Monnier (eds.), The Impossibility of God (2003), pp. 408-21 (esp. the Cantorian argument on pp. 414-19). Location: Rm. 442, BU Photonics Center, 8 St. Mary’s St., Boston. Free & open to all. Info: DASociety@aol.com.
item.name: Disproof Atheism Society: "Propositional Disproofs of an Omniscient God"
